name.baseName: Remediated soil ; Mercury contaminated agricultural soil ; Stabilization/solidification with biochar based powdered activated carbon
修复后土壤;农田汞污染土壤修复;生物炭基活性炭固化稳定化

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The S/S treatment of mercury contaminated soil using sulfur-impregnated activated carbon has been demonstrated to be effective in achieving leaching thresholds.
使用硫浸渍活性炭对汞污染土壤进行S/S处理已被证明在达到浸出阈值方面是有效的。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit in this study is the treatment of 1 tonne of mercury contaminated top soil in agricultural land to meet regulatory standards. The average initial mercury concentration is 134 mg/kg.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The study site is agricultural land contaminated by mercury, located in Guizhou Province in Southern China.This particular case is representative of the typical scale and scenario where agricultural land is contaminated by nearby mining and smelting operations.
研究地点位于中国南方贵州省，为受汞污染的农田。这一特殊案例代表了农业用地被附近的采矿和冶炼作业污染的典型规模和情景。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: In S/S, a stabilizing reagent is mixed with contaminated soil, leading to reduced leachability of mercury in the soil matrix, either due to the physical binding/enclosure (solidification) or chemical reaction (stabilization). Because S/S does not reduce the total mercury content, the stabilized material still requires disposal in a landfill. Powder reactivated carbon (PAC) modified by sulfur is used for stabilization. The production of powder reactivated carbon are from biochar based PAC that is produced from the local area. A cement dosage ratio of 6% is used based on data from a full scale cement-based S/S project.
在S/S中，由于物理结合/封闭（固化）或化学反应（稳定），稳定试剂与受污染的土壤混合，导致汞在土壤基质中的可浸出性降低。由于S/S不会降低总汞含量，因此稳定材料仍需要在垃圾填埋场进行处理。采用硫改性的粉末活性炭（PAC）进行稳定化处理。粉末活性炭的生产来自当地生产的基于生物炭的PAC。根据全尺寸水泥基S/S项目的数据，使用6%的水泥用量比。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The powdered activated carbon (PAC) stabilization/solidification (S/S) process described is intended for the remediation of mercury-contaminated agricultural soil. Specifically, sulfur-impregnated activated carbon is used to treat the soil to reduce mercury leachability to achieve regulatory leaching thresholds. This process is suitable for agricultural lands impacted by pollution from nearby mining and smelting operations, particularly where the aim is to remediate the land for continued agricultural use without reducing the total mercury content. It represents a typical solution for land decontamination on a scale representative of such incidents in agricultural settings.
本报告中描述的粉末活性炭 (PAC) 固化稳定化 (S/S) 处理过程，旨在修复农田汞污染土壤。具体而言，使用硫浸渍活性炭来处理土壤，以降低汞的浸出性，并达到监管部门设定的浸出门槛。该过程适用于受附近采矿和冶炼作业污染的农田，尤其是在不减少总汞含量的情况下，为继续农业使用而进行土地修复。它代表了农业环境中此类事件的标准化土地净化解决方案。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Hou D ,Gu Q ,Ma F , et al. Life cycle assessment comparison of thermal desorption and stabilization/solidification of mercury contaminated soil on agricultural land [J]. Journal of Cleaner Production, 2016, 139 949-956.

Hou D ,Gu Q ,Ma F , et al. Life cycle assessment comparison of thermal desorption and stabilization/solidification of mercury contaminated soil on agricultural land [J]. Journal of Cleaner Production, 2016, 139 949-956.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Data users should note that while the S/S treatment described effectively reduces mercury leachability, it does not alter the total mercury content in the soil. Therefore, after treatment, disposal of the stabilized material in a landfill is still necessary. The data provided is specific to the treatment of 1 tonne of mercury-contaminated topsoil with an initial mercury concentration of 134 mg/kg. Users intending to apply this data to their LCA models should consider site-specific conditions, such as the initial contamination levels and local regulatory requirements. When using the process data for S/S treatment, the user should ensure that input and output flows include all key raw materials and essential energy consumption, and consider that the technological applicability is based on using a 6% cement dosage ratio from a full-scale cement-based S/S project in the local context.

使用数据的用户应注意，所描述的S/S处理虽有效降低了汞的可浸出性，但并未改变土壤中总汞含量。因此，处理后，仍需将稳定材料处置于垃圾填埋场。提供的数据特定于处理初始汞浓度为134mg/kg、1吨汞污染表层土壤的情况。用户在将此数据应用于其生命周期评估模型时，应考虑具体的现场条件，如初始污染水平和当地的监管要求。在使用S/S处理的过程数据时，用户应确保输入输出流包括所有关键原材料和必要的能源消耗，并确保技术适用性基于当地实际情况使用了一个全尺寸水泥基S/S项目中的6%水泥用量比。

completeness.common:other: All maior raw materials and all the essentialenergy is ncuded.
输入输出流包括所有主要原材料和所有必要的能源消耗

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
